query:
ALTER TABLE marketingTriggers 
MODIFY COLUMN triggerType ENUM(
  'user_register',
  'first_order', 
  'order_amount',
  'user_inactive',
  'user_churn',
  'user_birthday',
  'birthday',
  'time_based',
  'scheduled_time'
) NOT NULL;
